title: Variables
summary: Variables store values in a program so you can reuse, update, and work with those values later. They act as containers that hold data.
sample_question: What is a variable and why is it useful?

title: Loops
summary: Loops repeat a block of code multiple times. A for loop repeats for a fixed number of times, while a while loop repeats until a condition is no longer true.
sample_question: Explain the difference between a for loop and a while loop.
